text: it would be great if you're on a particular guide and you click the API endpoints button and it dropped you on the endpoint for that particular guide that you were just looking at, and vise versa.

EX: if I click on the API Endpoints tab while on the sequences guide (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/api/automation/sequences>) it should send me to the API Endpoints page for sequences
actually doesn't look like this guide actually has an endpoint.
same applies to the contact api though
